course.title: Mastery of Two Pointer Technique for Competitive Programming
course.description: Learn to solve complex problems using the two-pointer technique with a focus on candidate master level.
course.courseObjective: Solve complex problems using the two-pointer technique with a time complexity of O(n) or better.

modules.title: Foundations of Two Pointer Technique
modules.moduleObjective: Understand the basic concepts of two-pointer technique and its applications.

lessons.title: Introduction to Two Pointer Technique
lessons.briefDescription: Learn to use two pointers to solve problems involving array manipulation.
lessons.deliverables: Implement a basic two-pointer technique to solve an array manipulation problem.

lessons.title: Two Pointer Technique for Array Pairs
lessons.briefDescription: Learn to use two pointers to solve problems involving array pairs.
lessons.deliverables: Implement a two-pointer technique to solve an array pairs problem.

lessons.title: Two Pointer Technique for Array Subarrays
lessons.briefDescription: Learn to use two pointers to solve problems involving array subarrays.
lessons.deliverables: Implement a two-pointer technique to solve an array subarrays problem.

lessons.title: Two Pointer Technique for Array Intersection
lessons.briefDescription: Learn to use two pointers to solve problems involving array intersection.
lessons.deliverables: Implement a two-pointer technique to solve an array intersection problem.

modules.title: Implementation and Core Mechanics
modules.moduleObjective: Understand how to implement the two-pointer technique in real-world scenarios.

lessons.title: Implementing Two Pointer Technique in C++
lessons.briefDescription: Learn to implement the two-pointer technique in C++.
lessons.deliverables: Implement a two-pointer technique in C++ to solve an array manipulation problem.

lessons.title: Implementing Two Pointer Technique in Java
lessons.briefDescription: Learn to implement the two-pointer technique in Java.
lessons.deliverables: Implement a two-pointer technique in Java to solve an array manipulation problem.

lessons.title: Implementing Two Pointer Technique in Python
lessons.briefDescription: Learn to implement the two-pointer technique in Python.
lessons.deliverables: Implement a two-pointer technique in Python to solve an array manipulation problem.

modules.title: Advanced Two Pointer Technique
modules.moduleObjective: Understand how to apply the two-pointer technique to solve complex problems.

lessons.title: Advanced Two Pointer Technique for Array Pairs
lessons.briefDescription: Learn to apply the two-pointer technique to solve complex array pairs problems.
lessons.deliverables: Implement an advanced two-pointer technique to solve an array pairs problem.

lessons.title: Advanced Two Pointer Technique for Array Subarrays
lessons.briefDescription: Learn to apply the two-pointer technique to solve complex array subarrays problems.
lessons.deliverables: Implement an advanced two-pointer technique to solve an array subarrays problem.

lessons.title: Advanced Two Pointer Technique for Array Intersection
lessons.briefDescription: Learn to apply the two-pointer technique to solve complex array intersection problems.
lessons.deliverables: Implement an advanced two-pointer technique to solve an array intersection problem.

modules.title: Real-World Architecture
modules.moduleObjective: Understand how to apply the two-pointer technique in real-world scenarios.

lessons.title: Applying Two Pointer Technique in Real-World Scenarios
lessons.briefDescription: Learn to apply the two-pointer technique in real-world scenarios.
lessons.deliverables: Implement a two-pointer technique in a real-world scenario.

lessons.title: Optimizing Two Pointer Technique for Real-World Scenarios
lessons.briefDescription: Learn to optimize the two-pointer technique for real-world scenarios.
lessons.deliverables: Optimize a two-pointer technique for a real-world scenario.

modules.title: Mastering Two Pointer Technique
modules.moduleObjective: Master the two-pointer technique and apply it to solve complex problems.

lessons.title: Mastering Two Pointer Technique for Array Pairs
lessons.briefDescription: Learn to master the two-pointer technique for array pairs problems.
lessons.deliverables: Master the two-pointer technique for an array pairs problem.

lessons.title: Mastering Two Pointer Technique for Array Subarrays
lessons.briefDescription: Learn to master the two-pointer technique for array subarrays problems.
lessons.deliverables: Master the two-pointer technique for an array subarrays problem.
